name: Circledrop
description:
Circledrop

My first ever entry for "One hour game jam #65"

You have two goals, two different colours... Just make sure you choose the one that is the correct colour.

Please post your scores in the comments!

P.S I wish I alternated the player colour now. Would go with the 2 colour theme a bit more and adds difficultly a tad bit. Oh well. Whatever. Nevermind. D:
